rows.label: tlk42300013_03_msg0001
rows.name: It seems the final battle is upon you, is it not?

rows.label: tlk42300013_03_msg0002
rows.name:
You, who have unraveled the secret of
Captain Nopopon, will surely be victorious.

rows.label: tlk42300013_03_msg0004
rows.name: I entrust the future of Alst to you...

rows.label: tlk42300013_03_msg0005
rows.name:
I did it, mo!
I spoke ancient Nopon speech perfectly, mo!

rows.label: tlk42300013_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Moh?!
I let some modern Nopon speech slip out... mo.
